TopicTitle: Mission goals do not marks as completed

Articles.Content: The first objective of the mission is not marked as completed, because this is not possible to fulfill the mission. The vessel has an antenna and a charge in the batteries.

"Power" means that you need means to generate and store ECharge - you need solar panels or RTGs plus battery.

There is a bug - launch clamps generate ECharge, so they'll count as "power generator", but since you cannot take them to the space, you'll fail the contract.

And BTW, this is a stock bug.

Right, I don't see a power source on that satellite, but I might not be able to see from this angle. The objective wants you to have an unmanned probe, with a power source (solar panel or RTG) and an antenna. It also needs to be new, meaning that every part of it was launched after the contract was accepted.
